feedback.fit: Nice pairing of short sleeve top with trousers. The silhouette is flattering with the proportions work well for your frame.
feedback.color: The periwinkle elements pairs nicely with the taupe elements. showing good understanding of coordinating colors.
feedback.footwear: Consider adding appropriate footwear to complete the look.
feedback.accessories: This outfit could benefit from some accessories. Consider adding a scarf or hat to add dimension and personality.
feedback.style: Excellent execution of casual style. there's thoughtful coordination without appearing too studied.
